user.title: OVO Energy Australia - Choose Setup Method
user.description:
How would you like to set up OVO Energy Australia?

**Recommended:** Paste OAuth Response (easiest - just copy/paste JSON)

json.title: Paste OAuth Response
json.description:
**Easy Setup - Just 3 steps:**

1. Open https://my.ovoenergy.com.au in your browser
2. Press F12 → Network tab → Login
3. Find 'oauth/token' request → Response tab → Copy entire JSON

Paste the JSON response below:

data.account_id: Account ID (from Payload tab in any graphql request)

password.title: Username & Password
password.description: Enter your OVO Energy credentials. Tokens will be fetched automatically.

tokens.title: Manual Token Entry
tokens.description:
For advanced users. Enter tokens manually.

Tokens will be automatically refreshed every 4 minutes.
